assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kuribayashi Steamship Co., Ltd. engages in the marine transportation business in Japan and internationally. It transports cargo, including paper products, used raw paper, cast and forged steel products, commercial vehicles, and general merchandise products. The company also provides land and sea integrated transportation services for the collection and delivery of cargoes; coastal irregular ships that transports oil refinery pressure vessels for refineries and blades for wind power generation facilities; wholesale of fruits and vegetables; and irregular freighter services for bulk cargo transportation, such as steel, raw sugar, rice, fertilizer, ore, etc. In addition, it is involved in ferry, hotel, and real estate, ship management, equipment development and sale businesses. Kuribayashi Steamship Co., Ltd. was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
